NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism: PViMS uses Swagger API to handle data. This is both PULL and POST using .json or .xml.: https://pvims-api.msh.org/

adherenceSteps: MSH is the current custodian of PViMS. The Privacy Policy and Terms of Use that apply are located here: https://github.com/MSH/PViMS-2/tree/master/policyandterms

bestPracticesList: WHO Digital Principles of Digital Development
CI/CD on Azure DevOps and GitHub actions

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: For enhanced security we apply SSL, conduct penetration testing. Additional steps are detailed in the Policy and Terms of Use: https://github.com/MSH/PViMS-2/blob/master/policyandterms/termsofuse.pdf

dataPrivacySecurity.privacySecurityDescription: To ensure privacy and data protection we are applying the following privacy policy (https://github.com/MSH/PViMS-2/blob/master/policyandterms/privacypolicy.pdf). Inaddition to that we are applying encryption and obfuscation of PII at database level.
